intent_atoms.description: Provide global CLI options for validation presets, including --preset, --structural-only, --enable-rule, and --disable-rule.
CLI must correctly parse preset flags and apply them to threaded validation configuration.
Disabled rules should be filtered from output.
Preset details must be embedded in JSON exports and batch summaries.
Metadata printing for presets should be available via CLI.
JSON annotations must include preset metadata.
Threaded validation configuration must always propagate preset settings through the CLI context.
Preset information is threaded through the CLI context and embedded in JSON exports.

functional_units.name: Global CLI Flags for Validation Preset
functional_units.description: Provides global command-line options --preset, --structural-only, --enable-rule, and --disable-rule to configure validation behavior across the application.

functional_units.name: Threaded Validation Configuration via CLI Context
functional_units.description: Passes threaded validation settings and metadata through the CLI context to enable concurrent processing of validation tasks.

functional_units.name: Disabled Rule Output Filtering
functional_units.description: Filters out output for rules that have been disabled by user flags, ensuring only relevant results are shown.

functional_units.name: Preset Metadata in JSON Exports
functional_units.description: Embeds detailed preset information into JSON export files and batch summaries for traceability and reporting.

functional_units.name: CLI Test Coverage for Preset Parsing
functional_units.description: Automated tests validate correct parsing of presets, handling of conflicting overrides, metadata printing, and JSON annotations to catch regressions.

functional_units.name: Updated CLI Manual Documentation
functional_units.description: Documentation updates describe new global options, preset metadata output, JSON export annotations, and batch filtering behavior for end‑users.
